Hi,

It's that time again.

We're going to try 2.5B (maybe more) this time.=
 We've upgrade our 
bandwidth to 250Mbps, all year round.

So that means we=
're going to keep the crawlers run until they 
fall. ;)

Before we start cr=
awling, as usual, more questions:

1. Should we upgrade to 1.12? (We were u=
sing 1.8, we know we have to 
use 1.10 because of the POST bug).

2. Any Ja=
va parameter settings? Last time I tried the HotSpot server 
VM and it was =
not usable after a couple days. I ended up having to 
specify "client mode"=
.

3. Need more explanation on this 'reduce-prefix-pattern' trick. How 
doe=
s it help in a long crawl?

4. Anything you think might be helpful for us t=
o know?

Thanks a lot,
-Joe
